workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.057898391539314364 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.4796468936395704 --weight-decay 0.0003585436057457584 --lr 0.000942737926186105 --lr-scheduler inverse_sqrt --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --min-lr 1e-9 --warmup-updates 121838 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.17302714680140002 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
